channel.title: All Us Geeks
channel.description: We're here to give voice to your inner geek.
channel.itunes:summary: All Us Geeks is co-hosted by Jeff King & Jordan Steinhoff and is the flagship podcast for the Geekcast Network, discussing board games, movies, television shows, books, comic books, Kickstarter, and all other aspects of geek culture. All Us Geeks also includes regular quarterly segments on LEGO and anime from contributing guest hosts. All Us Geeks explores all the geeky goodness out there. We give voice to your inner geek.
channel.itunes:author: Jeff King & Jordan Steinhoff
channel.itunes:subtitle: We're here to give voice to your inner geek.

item.itunes:summary:
Season 4 officially starts NOW! A few new things get introduced. Jeff and Sarah ask for some feedback. And, of course, we pick some projects to go head-to-head. They also end the show as they always do with a few shout outs to projects that deserve some attention. Current rules being used: http://www.allusgeeks.com/2013/03/fantasy-crowd-funding-league-rules/ Outstanding matches: http://www.allusgeeks.com/the-game-of-crowd-funding-fantasy-league-outstanding-matches/
EPISODE SPONSORS Meltdown Games - Gothic Doctor Kickstarter
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1080949461/gothic-doctor-a-game-of-monstrous-medicine?ref=allusgeeks
Launched July 1, 2014 Ends July 23, 2014 A quick tabletop card game for 2-4 players about curing monsters, foiling opponents, and becoming a partner. Patients based on monsters and miscreants from Victorian literature.
Base game: $25 (156 cards, all stretch goals)
Expanded game: $40 (adds a new way to play, 36 additional patient cards and 11 new, unique patients)
EU-Friendly Reviewed and loved by All Us Geeks. Check out some spoiled cards for Gothic Doctor here: http://www.allusgeeks.com/tag/gothic-doctor/ Hear all about this project in the Road to Relaunch series: http://www.allusgeeks.com/tag/road-to-relaunch/
Theorycraft Gaming - Factions Kickstarter
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/699966849/factions-a-customizable-strategy-wargame?ref=allusgeeks
Factions is a thought provoking strategy game that takes place in a futuristic Sci-Fi setting.
There are many options for customization, which gives the game a large amount of replay value. Players are able to customize the layout of the battle-grid, as well as their Faction prior to start of each game. The main objective is to obtain Victory Points, and players will find themselves wrestling over position during a tough fought battle. Players will develop varying strategies to help them obtain those victory points, and your approach will most likely change depending on which Faction you choose and how you deploy your army. The cards will only do so much in your favor, it's mostly about how you use them as a the leader of the army!
Factions is 2-4 player game, 1v1, 2v2, or 1v1v1 free for all. Games take 45-60 minutes to play
Check out the campaign video for a better look at the game!
Ends August 11, 2014.
July 8th Match-Ups: Round 1: Both (Jeff's Franchise): Mouse Guard: Swords & Strongholds
Round 2: Sarah: Athlas - Duel for Divinity vs. Jeff: The Lost Territories
Round 3: Both: Speakeasy
Round 4: Sarah: Switching Tracks vs. Jeff: Braiiiins!
Round 5: Jeff: Fire at Will! vs. Sarah: Terrene Odyssey
Shout Outs: Sarah Unpub Yardmaster Express
Jeff Maximum Xcrawl: Powered by Pathfinder Under The Flesh
Credits Music: Dan-O

EPISODE SPONSORS Gamerite Studios - Ultimate Battle Kickstarter https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1605435027/ultimate-battle-the-card-battle-sketching-game?ref=allusgeeks Some project highlights:
FULLY FUNDED! Ultimate Battle is a Card and sketching game for 2 or more players. The goal of the game is to destroy your opponents using cards to spur on illustrations. By drawing out attacks on sheets of paper between all players, you create a crazy, colorful battlefield. The core mechanic of the game is all about combining item cards into crazy combinations which players must illustrate. Will you combine the cards "wings" "shark" and "robot" to sketch out a flying robot shark? Will you combine the cards "brick" and "water" to weigh your opponent down and try to drown them? There are millions of combinations available. Ultimate Battle encourages players to think on the fly and work with what they've got when they launch attacks and attempt to defend against opponents. Your artistic level of expertise doesn't matter, you can be a fine artist or a stick-figure master, either way won't help or hurt you. Ends: July 31, 2014
Meltdown Games - Gothic Doctor Kickstarter
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1080949461/971602296?token=8d6a6886
Launching July 1, 2014 A quick tabletop card game for 2-4 players about curing monsters, foiling opponents, and becoming a partner. Patients based on monsters and miscreants from Victorian literature. EU-Friendly Reviewed and loved by All Us Geeks. Check out some spoiled cards for Gothic Doctor here: http://www.allusgeeks.com/tag/gothic-doctor/ Hear all about this project in the Road to Relaunch series: http://www.allusgeeks.com/tag/road-to-relaunch/

item.itunes:summary:
HAPPY TWO YEAR ANNIVERSARY TO ALL US GEEKS! March 16th we posted the first episode of All Us Geeks for the world to cringe over and we're still doing it without apology! Ok, we apologize from time to time but I swear it's half-hearted at the best of times!
Don is back to teach all a little something about anime. Scott Morris stops by to talk about the Arcane Wonders announcement and his new career path. And yeah, sorry to say you are still stuck with Jeff & Jordan as hosts. No game review for this episode!

item.itunes:summary:
Doug, from Meltdown Games, is back for Part 2 of The Road To Relaunch series. This time Jeff and Doug discuss the actionable items that are being put in place, based off of the lessons learned in Part 1, to hopefully lead to Gothic Doctor being successfully funded on Kickstarter this summer.
If you missed Part 1: http://www.allusgeeks.com/2014/01/the-game-of-crowd-funding-gothic-doctor-the-road-to-relaunch-part-1/
Note: This was recorded in February, but due to the move and family emergencies that have been discussed on the main podcast, editing took awhile. Part 3 will be recorded very soon.
Interview 00:00:21 Doug Levandowski
